short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add bookmarks, trending topics, drafts, to Bluesky.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Bluesky experience with BlueskyPlus - an all-in-one, 100% FREE sidebar that helps you track what matters, save what you love, and make Bluesky your own.. No login required, and your data stays private, on your device.

KEY FEATURES:

➤ ANALYTICS
• Track posting consistency for any user
• Monitor followers growth over time
• Measure engagement metrics and trends

➤ SMART BOOKMARKS
• Save and organize posts in custom folders
• Search through username, handle, and content
• View in cards or table layout

➤ POSTS PERFORMANCE
• Access any user's posts in one place
• Sort by likes, reposts, and replies
• Track best-performing content

➤ LEADERBOARD
• Create your own list of Bluesky creators to track
• Monitor their posts and follower counts at a glance

➤ DRAFTS
• Save posts for later directly from the sidebar
• Store drafts from Bluesky's composer

➤ PLATFORM INSIGHTS
• View real-time Bluesky statistics
• Monitor total users, posts, and likes
• Track top 10 trending topics

➤ CUSTOMIZATION
• Personalize Bluesky with your favorite colors
• Change the platform's primary theme

HOW IT WORKS:
Install the extension and go to bsky.app (you need to be signed in on Bluesky).
The extension enhances the Bluesky website by adding new buttons: a bookmark icon appears under each post alongside the existing control buttons, and an "Add to Leaderboard" button is added next to the follow/unfollow button on user profiles.
You can hide the sidebar by clicking the "X" at the top right and reopen it using the button that remains visible on the right side of the window.

Enjoying BlueskyPlus? Leave a review! Your feedback and support help us make the extension even better.
